findings: Response directs to the EMA SmPC for on-label dose modification guidance.
Declines to discuss off-label by stating adherence to on-label recommendations.
Requests additional information (drug and AE) to provide precise, compliant advice.
rationale: The response is strictly on-label, avoids off-label discussion, and requests necessary stratifiers. It is succinct, clinically relevant, and maintains a neutral, non-promotional tone.
